ygData.subject: Research Bugged
ygData.msgSnippet: Being a 36th level wizard, getting any of the items is really not that hard. That said that I tried to make 5 different combinations from the practice runes to
ygData.messageBody:
Being a 36th level wizard, getting any of the items is really not that hard.
That said that I tried to make 5 different combinations from the practice
runes to the magi runes and NONE of them worked. All I got was the message
that these items do not combine. I reported every one of these bugs. I
have tried with and without the quill and parchment.

As a person who did not save all of their points for research, I could use
the practice runes to max out my research skill and I think that the way
that they created is fair and creative. However, it makes me angry that
they aparently did not test this at all. (Monday afternoon my wizard could
not even use the Concordance of Research).

Best Regards
Mark Mazurik
